articles.author: Ganesh Rao
articles.title: UK and India strike a trade deal amid U.S.-led tariff tensions - CNBC
articles.description: The deal will see India gradually lower import taxes, with the vast majority of goods traded becoming "fully tariff-free within a decade."
articles.content:
The United Kingdom and India struck a bilateral trade agreement Tuesday, lowering tariffs on key exports such as U.K. whisky and cars, amid a global trade war initiated by the United States.
